remarks: A lattice line under a lattice plane is covered by it.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jun-2012.)

llncvrlpln2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.

llncvrlpln2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. N /\ Y e. P ) /\ X .<_ Y ) -> X C Y ) $.
